rtt.help.snippets.digest: Overview of seq's snippets - pre-built bits of patch to help make your patching faster.

rtt.help.modules.digest: All about seq's modules, which are complete UI and preset-enabled versions of the seq objects.

rtt.help.signalflow.digest: An intro to how signals work in rtt.

rtt.ex.feel.digest: An example that uses rtt.feel~ to create a loose groove.

rtt.ex.mc.digest: A multi-track sequencing example made with the MC version of seq~ objects.

rtt.ex.sometimes-retrig.digest: Combines rtt.retrig~ and rtt.rprob~ to play back a pattern with occasional ratcheting.

rtt.ex.traverse.digest: Uses advanced features of rtt.counter~ to navigate a melodic pattern.

rtt.ex.seqtwist.digest: seq objects hanging out with some of their best friends

rtt.ex.nestedtuplets.digest: Irregular rhythms built from unusual subdivisions

rtt.ex.quantized.digest: Quantize incoming MIDI notes with rtt.loop~ and rtt.onepulse~

rtt.ex.livesync.digest: Sync a sequencer with Ableton Live

rtt.ex.modwheelretrig.digest: Trigger and modulate ratchets with the keyboard and mod wheel.

rtt.ex.subdivratchet.digest: Create ratcheted rhythms with a cascade of subdivisions.

rtt.ex.jpgpattern.digest: Use an image file to create rhythms and play them back with rtt.pattern~.

rtt.xtra.fluidslice.digest: Generate a list of slice points for the rtt.dsp.simplesampler device used in the MC and subdiv ratchet examples. Uses the FluCoMa package.

rtt.xtra.img2pattern.digest: Ingests an image and produces a pattern.

rtt.xtra.link.digest: Clock similar to rtt.bar~ and rtt.clock~ that stays in sync with Ableton Live using Ableton Link. Uses the link package.

rtt.xtra.patterndisplay.digest: Visualize pattern playback in a Jitter matrix. Works with regular and MC signals.

rtt.xtra.pattrhelper.digest: Used in the rtt.pattrpresets snippet to make prest setup easy in a patch using seq modules or snippets.

rtt.xtra.stepgridviewer.digest: Single-channel pattern playback visualizer based on live.grid.

rtt.help.rnboexternal.digest: Demonstration of how the seq externals were made with RNBO.

rtt.ex.transpose.digest: Create evolving melodies by transposing one sequence with another.
